sentence.Network_en: Efforts are being made to avert war and find a diplomatic solution.
sentence.Network_cn: 各方正在为避免战争、寻求外交解决途径而作出积极的努力。

sentence.Network_en: I would do what I could to avert it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会尽力去避免发生这种情况.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'divert or deter someone from a place or a course of action'): from Latin avertere, from ab- 'from' + vertere 'to turn'; reinforced by Old French avertir

entry.def: If you avert something unpleasant, you prevent it from happening.

example.ex: Talks with the teachers' union over the weekend have averted a strike...
example.tran: 周末与教师工会举行的谈判避免了一场罢工。

example.ex: A fresh tragedy was narrowly averted yesterday.
example.tran: 昨天险些酿成一场新的悲剧。

entry.def: If you avert your eyes or gaze from someone or something, you look away from them.

example.ex: He avoids any eye contact, quickly averting his gaze when anyone approaches...
example.tran: 他避免任何眼神接触，一有人靠近就把目光迅速移开。

means.word_mean: 1. prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening;

sentences.sentence: "They averted their eyes when the King entered"

auth_sentence.content: The agreement should avert further economic and political turmoil.

auth_sentence.content: Only a Socialist Revolution can avert this catastrophe!

stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的
stems_affixes.word_buile: controvert[v.反驳,驳斥]+ible可..的→adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 更换信仰的, 修改的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ed……的→adj.更换信仰的, 修改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可改变的, 自由兑换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ible可..的→adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+controvertible[adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的]→adj.无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能兑换的,不能变换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+convertible[adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的]→adj.不能兑换的,不能变换的
advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……

stems_affixes.value_cn: 防止,避免 ;转移[目光,注意力等]
变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]
stems_affixes.word_buile: con+vert转→v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使转向,使改道;转移[注意力];使娱乐

sentences.en: She averted her eyes from the terrible sight.
sentences.cn: 她把目光转开, 不敢去看那可怕的景象。

jushi.english: Accidents can be averted by careful driving.
jushi.chinese: 谨慎驾驶可以防止事故。

jushi.english: Violence may have been averted with a greater police presence.
jushi.chinese: 如果出动了更多的警力,暴力行为原本可以避免。

jushi.english: Many traffic accidents can be averted by courtesy.
jushi.chinese: 礼让可以使许多交通事故得以避免。
